CASINO_CHIP_ENABLED.NAME: Casino Chip Enabled
CASINO_CHIP_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Is this game enabled for Casino Chip Rewards

CASINOCHIPS.ADDGAME: Click on a game to add it.

CASINO_CHIPS.CASINO_CHIP_VALUE_EXPLAIN: The unit value in cents ie). 10 would mean the reward is worth 10 cents

CASINO_CHIPS.NOGAMES: You have not chosen a game to be associated with the Casino Chip Reward
CASINO_CHIPS.NO_UNIT_VALUE: You have not chosen the unit value to be associated with the Casino Chip Reward
